A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For viewers who are hoping for a story consistent with the previously existing star wars stories\, disappointment is an understatement. This movie series has somehow managed to not only make Luke Skywalker a boring old grump\, but the entire destruction of the empire\, the sith\, and the death star was as it turns out\, didn't matter. The new characters are uninteresting\, and the story is nonsensical. I gave it 2 stars for the cinematography.
